item.title: 澳大利亚央行称美国提高关税拖累全球经济
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二表示，美国提高关税将拖累全球经济，并在短期内给贸易商品价格带来下行压力，但鉴于政策的不确定性，很难评估其确切影响。【原文：Australia's central bank said on Tuesday that higher U.S. tariffs would drag on the global economy and put near-term downward pressures on prices of traded goods, though the exact impact is hard to assess given the policy uncertainties.】

item.title: 台积电称关税有一定影响，但人工智能需求强劲
item.description: 台湾芯片制造商台积电首席执行官周二表示，美国关税正在产生一些影响，但人工智能（AI）的需求依然强劲，并继续超过供应。【原文：U.S. tariffs are having some impact but demand for artificial intelligence (AI) remains strong and continues to outpace supply, the chief executive of Taiwanese chipmaker TSMC said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 贸易焦虑持续，股市震荡，美元下跌
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市谨慎走高，美元跌至六周低点，原因是美国反复无常的贸易政策给市场蒙上了阴影，投资者在本周晚些时候的关键事态发展前转为防御。【原文：Asia shares edged cautiously higher on Tuesday while the dollar fell to a six-week low as erratic U.S. trade policies clouded over markets and investors turned defensive ahead of key developments later in the week.】

item.title: 受美国加征关税影响，5月份中国工厂活动降温
item.description: 周二的一项私营部门调查显示，中国5月份的工厂活动出现了八个月来的首次萎缩，这表明美国的关税开始直接伤害到这个制造业超级大国。【原文：China's factory activity in May shrank for the first time in eight months, a private-sector survey showed on Tuesday, indicating U.S. tariffs are now starting to directly hurt the manufacturing superpower.】

item.title: 日本央行上田表示，如果经济增长重新加速，将随时准备提高利率
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）周二表示，一旦央行确信经济和物价增长在经历一段时间的停滞后将重新加速，央行将提高利率。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said on Tuesday the central bank will raise interest rates once it is convinced enough that economic and price growth will re-accelerate after a period of stagnation.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行曾考虑在 5 月份大幅降息，但最终决定保持可预见性
item.description: 路透社悉尼6月3日电）澳大利亚央行上个月曾考虑大幅降息50个基点，作为应对全球贸易风险的 "保险 "措施，但最终还是决定采取可预见的谨慎宽松政策。【原文：SYDNEY, June 3 (Reuters) - Australia's central bank considered cutting interest rates by an outsized 50 basis points last month as "insurance" against global trade risks, but decided to go the predictable route with a cautious easing.】

item.title: 中国华为公司将于 6 月 11 日推出 Pura 80 系列产品
item.description: 中国华为技术公司（HWT.UL）在其社交媒体微博上发表声明称，将于 6 月 11 日推出 Pura 80 系列智能手机。【原文：China's Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL) said it will launch its Pura 80 smartphones series on June 11, a statement on its social media Weibo account showed.】

item.title: 贸易战拖累美国经济，美元维持在六周低位附近
item.description: 美元周二跌至六周低点，原因是有迹象表明，唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府正在发动的贸易战对美国经济造成了损害，从而导致美国经济脆弱。【原文：The dollar fell to a six-week low on Tuesday on signs of fragility in the U.S. economy because of damage from the trade war President Donald Trump's administration is waging.】

item.title: 澳大利亚将最低工资上调 3.5%，通胀缓解
item.description: 澳大利亚独立的工资制定机构周二将全国最低工资上调了 3.5%，自 7 月 1 日起生效，随着经济中通胀压力的缓解，约 260 万最低工资工人的工资得到了实际增长。【原文：Australia's independent wage-setting body on Tuesday raised the national minimum wage by 3.5% effective July 1, a real wage increase for about 2.6 million workers on the lowest pay as inflationary pressures ease in the economy.】

item.title: 石油因伊朗、俄罗斯和加拿大供应担忧而上涨
item.description: 周二，油价在亚洲早盘交易中上涨，原因是市场担心供应问题，伊朗将拒绝美国的核协议提案，而该提案将是放松对这个主要产油国制裁的关键，同时加拿大的生产也受到野火的影响。【原文：Oil prices rose in early Asia trade on Tuesday on concerns about supply, with Iran set to reject a U.S. nuclear deal proposal that would be key to easing sanctions on the major oil producer, and with production in Canada hit by wildfires.】

item.title: 机器人公司融资 6000 万美元扩大风力涡轮机维修规模
item.description: 拉脱维亚科技公司 Aerones 的客户包括通用电气和 Enel，该公司首席执行官告诉路透社，该公司已筹集了 6200 万美元，用于在全球推广机器人和其他人工智能解决方案，以保护和维护 30 多个国家的数千台风力涡轮机。【原文：Latvian tech company Aerones, which counts GE and Enel among its customers, has raised $62 million to fund a global roll out of robots and other AI-enabled solutions to protect and maintain thousands of wind turbines in over 30 countries, its CEO told Reuters.】

item.title: 巴西反垄断机构批准 Petz 和 Cobasi 合并
item.description: 巴西反垄断机构 Cade 周一无限制地批准了宠物用品零售商 Cobasi 和 Petz 的合并，Cade 网站上的决定显示了这一点。【原文：Brazil's antitrust body Cade approved on Monday, without restrictions, the merger of pet product retailers Cobasi and Petz , a decision on Cade's website showed.】

item.title: 派拉蒙全球公司提名三名董事会董事，Skydance 合并案等待批准
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）周一提名了三名新董事，力图将董事会人数增至七人，以等待监管部门批准其 84 亿美元与 Skydance Media 的合并。【原文：Paramount Global nominated three new directors on Monday, seeking to boost its board strength to seven as it awaits regulatory approval for its $8.4 billion merger with Skydance Media.】

item.title: Uber 外卖业务主管离职，内部人士麦克唐纳被任命为首席运营官
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies）周一表示，其外卖业务主管皮埃尔-迪米特里-戈尔-科蒂（Pierre-Dimitri Gore-Coty）将在离职近 13 年后离开公司。【原文：Uber Technologies said on Monday the head of its delivery business, Pierre-Dimitri Gore-Coty, is leaving the company after nearly 13 years.】

item.title: 美国食品和药物管理局推出人工智能工具，缩短科学审查时间
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局（U.S. Food and Drug Administration）周一表示，它已经推出了一款名为 "Elsa "的人工智能生成工具，旨在提高包括科学审查在内的各项业务的效率。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration said on Monday that it had launched a generative AI tool, Elsa, aimed at improving efficiency across its operations, including scientific reviews.】

item.title: Vanguard 申请新的中国以外新兴市场 ETF
item.description: 资产管理巨头先锋集团（Vanguard Group）计划推出一款新的交易所交易基金（ETF），该基金将以新兴市场为目标，但不包括中国。【原文：Asset management giant Vanguard Group plans to launch a new exchange-traded fund (ETF) that will target emerging markets while excluding China, joining a growing niche shaped by investor debate over China's role in global portfolios.】

item.title: ARK 21Shares 比特币 ETF 将于 6 月 16 日进行 3 对 1 股份拆分
item.description: 21Shares美国公司周一表示，将对其ARK 21Shares比特币ETF进行3对1的份额拆分，以使投资者更容易获得该基金，此举将于6月16日开市时生效。【原文：21Shares US said on Monday it will carry out a 3-for-1 share split of its ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF to make the fund more accessible to investors, with the move set to take effect at market open on June 16.】

item.title: 金吉达巴拿马公司将在管理层离开该国后解雇剩余员工
item.description: 巴拿马劳工部长周一表示，金吉达巴拿马公司的行政人员已离开该国，该公司将寻求政府授权解雇其在巴拿马的剩余人员。【原文：Chiquita Panama's administrative staff have left the country and the firm will seek authorization from the government to sack its remaining personnel in Panama, the nation's labor minister said on Monday.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，默克洽谈以 30 多亿美元收购生物技术公司 MoonLake
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周一援引三位知情人士的话报道称，默克公司已就以超过 30 亿美元的价格收购瑞士生物技术公司 MoonLake Immunotherapeutics 进行了谈判。【原文：Merck has held talks to buy Swiss biotech MoonLake Immunotherapeutics for more than $3 billion, the Financial Times reported on Monday, citing three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易日：贸易紧张局势转为初步希望
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】

item.title: NTSB 将于 6 月 24 日举行听证会，以确定 2024 年波音 737 MAX 9 中空紧急事件的原因
item.description: 美国国家运输安全委员会将于 6 月 24 日举行听证会，以确定 2024 年 1 月一架新波音 737 MAX 9 航班在空中发生机舱面板爆炸的可能原因，该事故使该飞机制造商陷入重大危机。【原文：The National Transportation Safety Board will hold a June 24 hearing to determine the probable cause of a mid-air cabin panel blowout of a new Boeing 737 MAX 9 flight in January 2024 that spun the planemaker into a major crisis.】

item.title: 美泰将合并电影和电视部门，成立美泰工作室
item.description: 玩具生产商美泰公司周一表示，将把旗下的电影和电视部门合并，成立美泰工作室，以生产由其品牌驱动的娱乐产品，并有可能重现 "芭比娃娃 "电影的商业成功。【原文：Toy maker Mattel is combining its film and television units to form Mattel Studios, it said on Monday, as the company seeks to produce entertainment driven by its brands and potentially repeat the commercial success of the "Barbie" movie.】

item.title: 微不足道 "漏洞结束后，零售商 Temu 在美国的日用户数量减少了一半
item.description: 根据市场情报公司Sensor Tower的数据，PDD控股公司的全球折扣电子商务平台Temu的美国日用户量在5月份下降了58%，这是该网络零售商在中美贸易战中面临的众多不利因素之一。【原文：Daily U.S. users of PDD Holdings' global discount e-commerce platform Temu fell by 58% in May, according to market intelligence firm Sensor Tower, one of many headwinds the e-retailer is facing amid a U.S.-China trade war.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Coinbase漏洞与印度客户数据泄露有关
item.description: 六位熟悉此事的人士告诉路透社，加密货币交易所 Coinbase 早在 1 月份就知道一家外包公司发生了客户数据泄露事件，而这一事件与一个规模更大、估计损失高达 4 亿美元的数据泄露事件有关。【原文：Cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase knew as far back as January about a customer data leak at an outsourcing company connected to a larger breach estimated to cost up to $400 million, six people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 马斯克的 Neuralink 公司在最新一轮融资中筹集到 6.5 亿美元资金
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的大脑植入公司 Neuralink 周一表示，该公司在最新一轮融资中筹集了 6.5 亿美元。【原文：Elon Musk's brain implant company Neuralink said on Monday that it had raised $650 million in its latest funding round.】

item.title: 美国 5 月份液化天然气产量较 4 月份创纪录的产量有所下降
item.description: 美国液化天然气公司（LSEG）的初步船舶跟踪数据显示，由于工厂停工和美国最大出口设施的维护，5月份美国液化天然气产量下降。【原文：U.S. liquefied natural gas output fell in May due to plant outages and maintenance at the country's largest export facility, preliminary LSEG ship tracking data show.】

item.title: 特朗普政府败诉后寻求暂停第二起关税诉讼案
item.description: 特朗普政府周一要求美国上诉法院暂停法院的第二项裁决，该裁决认定总统对进口商品征收全面关税的做法超越了其权限，并称该裁决危及与其他国家的贸易谈判。【原文：The Trump administration on Monday asked a U.S. appeals court to pause a second court ruling that found the president had exceeded his authority by imposing sweeping tariffs on imports, saying the decision jeopardizes trade negotiations with other nations.】

item.title: 独家报道关税大限将至，美国催促各国在周三前提供最佳报价
item.description: 据路透社查阅的一封致谈判伙伴的信函草案显示，特朗普政府希望各国在周三之前就贸易谈判提出最佳方案，因为官员们寻求在仅有五周的自我设定的最后期限之前加快与多个伙伴的谈判。【原文：The Trump administration wants countries to provide their best offer on trade negotiations by Wednesday as officials seek to accelerate talks with multiple partners ahead of a self-imposed deadline in just five weeks, according to a draft letter to negotiating partners viewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 消息人士称迪士尼将在全球裁员数百人
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周一透露，华特迪士尼将在全球范围内裁员数百人，裁员范围包括电影和电视市场营销、宣传、选角和开发等团队。【原文：Walt Disney is laying off several hundred employees globally in teams including marketing for film and television, publicity, and casting and development, a source familiar with the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 古尔斯比称，美联储在经历颠簸期后可能走上降息轨道
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周一表示，他仍然认为，在关税政策带来的不确定性 "空气中的污垢 "消除后，美国央行将能够降低短期借贷成本。【原文：Chicago Federal Reserve Bank President Austan Goolsbee said on Monday he continues to think the U.S. central bank will be able to lower short-term borrowing costs after the "dirt in the air" of uncertainty from tariff policies gets cleared up.】
